programs.name: FMCSA Motor Carrier Safety Assistance Program (MCSAP)
programs.description: Grants to states to assist in commercial motor vehicle safety enforcement.
programs.intended_scope: Commercial motor carriers, commercial drivers, interstate transportation in commerce.
constraints: Does not authorize treating all private drivers as commercial motor carriers.
States must adopt and enforce compatible laws with Federal Motor Carrier Safety Regulations for covered commercial activities.

programs.name: NHTSA Highway Safety Program Grants (Section 402)
programs.description: Highway safety grants to states for programs to reduce traffic deaths and injuries.
programs.intended_scope: Traffic safety programs consistent with federal law and constitutional protections.
constraints: Does not authorize states to ignore Fourth and Fourteenth Amendment limits.
States may not use grant incentives to justify unconstitutional stops, searches, or arrests.
